tipe.nama: Honeywell HPM Series â€“ IE5 Ultra Premium Motor

judul.teks1: Low-voltage permanent magnet synchronous motor with ultra-high efficiency (IE5) for industrial applications such as pumps, fans, and compressors. Designed for energy savings, lightweight performance, high reliability, and environmental sustainability, featuring IP55 protection and precise control with vector inverters.
judul.list2: Standard voltage and frequency: 380V, the frequency is set according to the design poles Power range: 4~560kW (750 RPM, 1000 RPM,1500 RPM, 3000 RPM), other speed can also be determined by requirement Carefully designed for an industrial exterior design IP55 Protection level F-class insulation level, grade B temperature rise standard with international brand high quality bearings The maximum torque multiple is not less than 2 times, with good short-time impact resistance overload capacity Designed for frequency conversion applications, standard self-fan air-cooled design can maintain constant torque output under 50% -100% RPM Stator winding is standard with PTC, other kinds of heat protection are optional ,combined with controller can achieve the motor temperature protection Customized solutions can be provided according to the special customer requirements
